displayName: Ensure 'AUTO_CLOSE' is set to 'OFF' on contained databases
rationale: Because authentication of users for contained databases occurs within the database not at the server\instance level, the database must be opened every time to authenticate a user. The frequent opening/closing of the database consumes additional server resources and may contribute to a denial of service.
recommended_action:
Execute the following T-SQL, replacing _`<database_name>`_ with each database name found by the Audit Procedure:
```
ALTER DATABASE <database_name> SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF;
```
error_message: One or more databases has 'AUTO_CLOSE' set to 'ON'
ruleNames: Ensure 'AUTO_CLOSE' is set to 'OFF' on contained databases
